name: AFAG Messen und Ausstellungen
description: The AFAG Messen und Ausstellungen is one of the leading organizations engaged in organizing international trade fairs trade exhibitions consumer shows regional exhibitions and conferences success fully all over the world since 1948. Their dedicated team of experts perform full-service all tasks straight from the preliminary market analysis advertising and PR concept the technical implementation and the professional project management to performance. Their organized programs are counted by the experts as their projects are planned prepared and organized. They have well positioned Companies based in Nuremberg with office in the Nuremberg Trade Fair. Since 2001 their headquarter in Wendelstein operate their business.

name: NurnbergMesse GmbH
description: The NurnbergMesse is an impressive organization that has rapidly emerged out to be one of the most recognized exhibition companies in Europe. Possessing all the essential ingredients that contributes to its successful line of events trade fairs exhibitions and congresses; the NurnbergMesse provides a complete and dynamic solution to its clients. It offers an all-embracing event portfolio of their own as well as guest and partner events having presently more than 90 exhibitions and conventions for numerous industries. NumbergMesse is an organization known for its highly specialized and pioneering event ideas. Since its formation in 1974 it has without fail seen throughout the years a steady rise in the number of qualified visitors and exhibitors. It prides itself upon its efficient and first-class service and through its events the company offers the ideal platform for the exhibitors and visitors to obtain maximum business opportunities.

name: Messe Frankfurt (Shanghai) Co. Limited
description: Providing a remarkable platform for companies wanting to enter the thriving market in China and Asia as well as seeking to expand their business, the Messe Frankfurt (Shanghai) Co. Limited is a pioneering exhibition company in Shanghai. The company is a division of the renowned and prestigious Messe Frankfurt Exhibition GmbH; which is also one of the oldest and biggest trade show organizer of Europe. Initially the company laid stress on primary industry areas related to building technology & lighting, communications and leisure, automotive technology, textiles and consumer goods; however it has started to make way towards conducting trade exhibitions in other industry sectors as well for further expansion of business prospects. With a dedicated and efficient team of experts and specialized services, the organization has conducted numerous high profile events and exhibitions with finesse.

name: Taiwan External Trade Development Council (TAITRA)
description: Taiwan trade a global online trading hub. It is designed to stimulate the immediate access to B2B e-commerce for Small & Medium Enterprises (SMEs) and to help them gain a digital edge over their global competition. In September 2009 TAITRA together with the Nanjing City government co-organize a Taiwan Outstanding Products Trade Show. The show serves as a most direct approach to integrate resources from all aspects especially Taiwans cultural and creative arts industry to facilitate the development of the China Market.TAITRA organized a total of 109 trade missions leading to considerable business opportunities.  5623 Taiwanese suppliers were introduced to foreign buyers. In addition TAITRA incorporated comprehensive procurement meetings with 11 major trade shows in Taipei. The joint efforts has been a great help for international buyers to meet many of Taiwanese suppliers during the  show through pre-scheduled meetings.

name: Messe Berlin GmbH

The trade show and convention industry is a key economic factor in the Berlin-Brandenburg area. It attracts significant buying power and brings in additional tax revenues. Trade shows and conventions play an important part in Berlins role as an international center of communications and commerce.

name: Messe Essen GmbH
description: Fairs take place in Essen on more than 100 days a year. The MESSE ESSEN programme comprises roughly 40 fairs and exhibitions. 13 of them are international leading fairs. More than 12500 exhibitors make use of the Essen fair complex every year. Almost one in four of them comes from abroad. The exhibition area covers 110000 square metres and all 19 fair halls are directly linked to each other.This top-class fair venue has enjoyed steady development. For example turnover has doubled in the last 10 years. MESSE ESSEN is situated in the region in Germany with the strongest economy and highest population. It is central and easy to reach. Every year up to 2 million visitors come to Essen from roughly 100 countries to maintain contacts and forge new ones. MESSE ESSEN ranks among the best fair venues with the most visitors and is in the top ten in Germany.

name: Mattfeldt & Singer Marketing and Fair AG
description: Trade fairs are still an important marketing tool. For more than 20 years, fairs have been our profession. With more than 60 trade fairs a year, no one organizes regional fairs any more than we do. From Mattfeldt & Sänger, an advertising agency founded in Munich in 1990, Mattfeldt & Sänger Marketing und Messe AG was founded in 1999 as a trade fair organizer based in the Allgäu region. Initially specializing in energy, construction & real estate exhibitions, over the years we have been involved in fairs around health, wellness & sports, job & career, women's fairs and consumer shows. The innovative trade fair offer is developed as a team depending on the market situation and needs. Since 2006, we have been offering our customers a full-service offer for our trade fair appearance via our own exhibition construction department. We stand for trade fairs with a regional orientation. For us, quality means satisfied exhibitors, partners and visitors. Our almost 40 employees have the experience of more than 800 trade fairs.

name: Eurobaustoff MBH & Co. Kg
description: EUROBAUSTOFF mbH & Co KG is a dominant German cooperative representing about 498 average companies throughout Europe. This association was established in 1960 by the amalgamation of three retailers of the construction business namely INTER PARES, IBS performance bond and Mobau. In 2006 a meeting of all the shareholders of the organization took place in Dresden, renaming the organization as EUROBAUSTOFF mbH & Co KG. The next big event of the organizer is Eurobaustoff Forum which is going to be hosted in Cologne, Germany in the month of November 2012. The organization came into existence in the year 1991 and since then it continuous track record of innovation and product development. It is considered as one of the most successful companies competitors in the publishing and exhibitions business around the world. It has so far launched more than 20 highly specialised exhibitions and some 25 leading international magazines with total emphasis on transportation and kindred industries. It has bagged the most prestigious PPA International Business Magazine of the Year award and has also received prestigious listings in Europe 500 and The Sunday Times Profit Track 100.

name: Messe Stuttgart International
description: Messe Stuttgart is about to make a great leap forward: construction of its much-longed-for new trade fair center directly adjacent to Stuttgart airport has started. Messe Stuttgart already has an inestimable advantage compared with many of its competitors. The Stuttgart trade fair area is home to all types of trade fairs  exhibitions congresses technical conferences company presentations and other events. Trade fairs in Stuttgart are the kick start catalyst and scout for new developments and themes. It can offer a full service many years of experiences and professional advice to help our customers to open up national and international markets.

name: Smarter Shows (Tarsus) Ltd
description: Smarter Shows (Tarsus) Ltd is a leading organization known efficiently for organization creative and successful events. It helps the professionals and experts to connect and interact with each other and to share their ideas and detailed news and information about the industry.  It aims to develop great ideas and new developmental opportunities for all the business of its clients. Many face to face meetings B2B exhibitions and other events and tradeshows are hosted and conducted by this organization. Space Tech Expo and other events and tradeshows are managed by this organization.

name: Reed Exhibitions Deutschland GmbH
description: Reed Exhibitions founded in 1894 by Mr.Albert Reed initially started as a newspaper printing press. Reed and Elsevier joined forces in 1993 and since then the company has been imparting businesses and communication support for business growth in diverse sectors. Presently it has achieved a global status of a leading trade show and exhibitions organizer and is popularly known as the knowledge mediator. The company has a successful track record of organizing at least 440 trade shows in more than 36 countries across the world. The successful businesses strategies of the company has made their trade shows a wonderful platform for mutual interaction between buyers and sellers for the mutual development of business. The trade fairs and shows arranged by Reed Exhibitions Deutschland GMBH are famous for its business productivity. The companys ISG helps in giving exhibitors an international exposure and generate billions in export business.

name: HSV
description: HSV is an organization that is dedicated to the field of sports. This company also known as Hamburger Sport Verein is not only a football club but also a provider of 30 other kind of sports disciplines. In the year 1887 this company was established. It was only an athletic club back then. Mr. Frank Arnesan is the Sports Director of this company. Imtech Arena HSV TV and HSV museum are some of the many endeavors of this company. The main office of this universal sports club is situated in Hamburg Germany. Being one of the oldest sport clubs in Germany this company has many clubs like the Kids Club and the supporters club which has been established since the year 1993. Merchandising Messe Hamburg is one of the many events that would be organized by this company.

name: Mack Brooks Exhibitions
description: The Mack Brook Group operates as Mack Brooks Exhibitions and Mack Brooks Publishing organizing shows and publishing periodicals internationally within specialist trades. The Mack Brooks Exhibitions Group builds its markets worldwide by bringing buyers and sellers together in the specialized market-places. The company was established in 1965 owns and organizes leading international trade fairs & business to business exhibitions events and conferences around the world in the fields of information technology engineering transport metalworking textiles railways food and beverages construction tunneling converting printing airport management and aviation.

name: Kortrijk Xpo
description: In 1966 the Kortrijk municipality started to build a new exhibition complex in Kortrijk, Zuid, beside the future exit of the planned E3 motorway. The Town Council decided to concede the management of the premises to a special association to be set up for that purpose, representing all the interest groups of the region.

name: SAYS-marketing GmbH

It is in the market since its inception in the year 2003. The main mission of this organization is to connect and interact with each other and to gain significant and detailed ideas and opportunities among the professionals and experts of the industry. The organization hosts some of the best known events and tradeshows and also develops great and unique platform for the clients to network with their target audiences and to enhance their market and business opportunities significantly. It delivers wide range of detailed information and ideas and also develops great prospects and opportunities that have been developed in the respective sector that it focuses upon. It hosts the Forum Berufsstart among others.

name: IfT Institute for Talent Development GmbH
description: The IfT Institute for Talent Development works for six target groups:Training companies, technical colleges and institutions: We promote their recruiting. We bring them together with potential apprentices and / or students as well as people interested in further education - in mostly prepared, scheduled discussions.Teenagers: We help them discover their talents and choose professions that suit their profiles. We also motivate them to volunteer in clubs and initiatives.Parents: Parents are supported in advising their sons and daughters on their career choice.Schools: We assist you in the implementation of job-oriented concepts. Young adults: We motivate them to progress professionally.Business sectors, locations, regions and countries: We are committed to the objectives of securing skilled labor, vocational training, start-up / succession planning and regional development.

name: Stahlgruber

The Stahlgruber Company was established by two brothers Otto and Willy Gruber in the year 1923. The main office of this organization is situated in Poing, Munich, Germany. name: Messe Dusseldorf GmbH
description: Messe Dusseldorf is a leading international trade fair partner and provider of event-specific exhibitor and visitor services. Founded in 1947 Messe Dusseldorf currently has a workforce of around 600 with consolidated sales for 2004 around EURO 369 Million. Around 29500 exhibitors presented their products and services to 1.8 million visitors in 17 exhibition halls with a gross area of some 252000 sqm. 22 of around 40 fair events staged in Dusseldorf represent the No. 1 in their sector. The international network behind the Messe Dusseldorf group of companies spans 100 countries and comprises 65 foreign representatives 13 direct shareholdings and subsidaries. The group can draw on 40 years experience in organising foreign trade fairs with a track record of over 4000 events staged worldwide.

name: Wearable Tech
description: WT | Wearable Technologies is the global business development and innovation platform in the wearable space. Since 2006 WT has established a network of over 30,000 companies consisting of technology leaders, highly innovative manufacturing companies and Blue Chip corporations. Our vision is to proactively create an intelligent Wearables & IoT landscape for the future. WT | Wearable Technologies connects innovative engineers from technology hubs and start-up centers around the globe. WT fosters this community by organizing networking events, and consulting sessions. Our portfolio consists of business development, technology marketing, innovation through the IoT / WT Innovation World Cup, strategy and technology consulting services. WT | Wearable Technologies organizes international conferences and trade shows in partnership with leading trade organizations, associations and other highranking partners and has offices in the US and Europe.

name: DECHEMA
description: DECHEMA is the hub of an interdisciplinary network of topic-oriented committees organizing events and professional development courses for all who are interested in a specialized subject area. DECHEMA has over 5800 members - individuals institutions and companies.

name: Navispace
description: Navispace AG is an internationally recognized technology marketing company located in Greater Munich. Navispace AG?s core competence lies in the intersectoral transfer of technologies.

name: Messe Frankfurt Exhibition Gmbh
description: Having international presence in more than 150 countries the Messe Frankfurt Exhibition GmbH has been organizing prestigious events in 30 different locations worldwide. The company enjoys global prominence and recognition in the exhibition industry and is the worlds largest trade fair organizer. It is a state-owned organization with 60% owned by the City of Frankfurt and 40% by the State of Hesse. Messe Frankfurt has its own exhibition complex to conduct their notable exhibitions and boasts of having an international network of 52 global Sales Partners five branch offices and 28 subsidiaries. With an impressive portfolio of highly successful trade shows and events in Germany and other countries the Messe Frankfurt Exhibition GmbH has been critically acclaimed for organizing these events with finesse. Premier trade shows such as Ambiente, Beauty world, Christmas world including other have been efficiently organized by Messe Frankfurt.

name: DLG
description: DLG International GmbH takes a leading role in consulting internationally operating organisations and institutions in the field of technical co-operation as well as its own subsidiaries and partners.
